home.heroSub: ALL THE BEST PRODUCTS FOR YOUR LIVESTOCK FARMING
home.aboutText: VinPrime provides clean materials for livestock farming, pellet production, mushroom cultivation, and many other industrial applications.

about.title: About VinPrime
about.description: Established in March 2023, with the knowledge accumulated from many years of experience of the Founders, VIN PRIME was born to carry out the mission: Taking advantage of abundant locally available raw materials to create products used in livestock have global standard, develop economic and helps farmers increase production and income.
about.mission: Leveraging abundant locally available raw materials to create livestock products that meet global standards.
about.vision: To become a leading company in the livestock materials sector in Vietnam and the region.
